section.p: There is a Windows 8.1 installation and user guide which should also be informative for Mac users.

The extensions are built using HFST — specifically hfst-ospell (source code) — and Voikko, specifically the LibreOffice-voikko extension (source code). The spellers here are a direct application of the normative fst used as a spelling checker (in combination with an error model to create suggestions).

This is work in progress, and there are several open issues still to be worked out. Although the available spellers and extensions should work fine for the specified LibreOffice versions, please bear with us and report any issues you find to feedback@divvun.no
